content: Bank Account Asked by AnonymousAsked on 28 Aug 2019If I were to close a bank account and decide to open the same one few years down the road, is it possible to do so?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loh Tat Tian, 2nd Hand Insurance Broker / EX-FA at Singapore Insurance Value FindingLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 29 Aug 2019It's possible to open and close an account a few years down the road. But if you want to have the same account number, it cannot be done though.0 comments0
